projects.title: Chefswap - Social Cooking Meetup App
projects.bodyText:
- A Marketplace-style social web app made to connect users over homecooked meals.
- Implemented REST design principles to develop flexible and scalable RESTful API backend using Express
- Applied relational database expertise to design and interface with PostgreSQL database for storing, accessing, and manipulating data securely and efficiently.
- Documented API using Swagger enabling straightforward integration with frontend

projects.title: PlantPedia - AI-powered Plant Identification App
projects.bodyText:
- A mobile app that uses AI to identify plants and provide information about them.
- Model built with TensorFlow has over 90% accuracy in identifying plants from images

projects.title: SMS Assist - SMS chatbot for customer service
projects.bodyText:
- An SMS chatbot that uses AI to provide customer service.
- Used IBM Watson Assistant to classify intent from user input and choose appropriate response
- Send and receive messages using Twilio API for easy and convenient customer support access via SMS

projects.title: Alexa MD - Amazon Alexa skill for medical diagnosis and treatment suggestions
projects.bodyText:
- An Amazon Alexa skill that uses AI to diagnose medical conditions and provide treatment suggestions.
- Designed decision tree using Voiceflow to ask and track user symptoms and provide appropriate treatment suggestions for predicted illness
- Compiled data from CDC and WHO to quantitatively associate symptoms with illnesses for use in prediction algorithm
- Assign probabilities to each illness based on each symptom's association with that illness
